title: Call Center Supervisor/Lead
job_overview:
Are you a natural leader with a passion for coaching teams and delivering outstanding customer experiences?
This is your chance to level up your career with a company that values your skills, supports your growth, and celebrates your wins!

Position Details:
Rate: $5 up to $7 per hour (depending on experience and skillset)
Schedule: Must be available to work during US (PST) hours
Work from home

What You'll Be Doing:
-Supervise and lead the team to ensure smooth daily operations
-Monitor schedules, routes, and assignments to maximize efficiency
-Resolving escalated customer concerns with professionalism
-Provide coaching, feedback, and support to teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
-Resolve any dispatch-related issues in a timely manner
-Managing shift schedules, workflows, and KPIs
-Prepare and submit reports as required

You’re a Perfect Fit If You Have:
-Proven experience as a call center supervisor, in dispatch and logistics.
-Strong leadership and problem-solving skills
-Excellent communication and organizational abilities
-Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment
-A passion for coaching and mentoring
-Experience with CRM systems and performance tools
-A cool, calm, and collected attitude under pressure

Why Join Us?
-100% remote work
-Opportunities for advancement
-Supportive, collaborative environment
-A company that values your input and ideas
-Be a key player in a growing, high-performing team

How to Apply:
-Send us your updated resume and include the answer to this question in your email subject line:
-What color do you get when you combine red and yellow?

Applications without this answer in the subject line will not be considered.

Ready to lead, grow, and thrive? Apply now and make your mark!
Let’s build something great together.
